EmailTemplate.name: 2013SGTs.Confirmation_March-KS
EmailTemplate.subject: REGISTRATION CONFIRMATION: 2013 Billing Software Group Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Registration Confirmation Thank you for registering for the El Dorado, KS 2013 Billing Software Group Training. Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Billing Customer}},
Thank you for registering for the March 5-6, 2013 Billing Software Group Training in El Dorado, KS. If you selected credit card payment, a TriTech representative will contact you for your payment information. The $500 fee can be paid via check or credit card.
If you need a hotel room, we recommend the following: Holiday Inn Express <http://www.hiexpress.com/hotels/us/en/el-dorado/eelks/hoteldetail/directions>, 3100 W. El Dorado Ave, El Dorado, KS 67042 Hotel Front Desk: 316-322-7275 Block of rooms held under "TriTech" at rate of $79.99 per night plus tax
The training is located at: 701 N Haverhill, El Dorado, KS 67042. The training room has wireless internet, so you are welcome to bring a laptop.
The closest airport is in Wichita, about 25-30 miles from the training location.
If you have questions or if there is anything we can do to make this a better experience for you, please contact us:
Grant Helferich, Butler County EMS 316-321-9260 or ghelferich@bucoks.com
Brenda Taylor, TriTech Software Systems 800-537-3927 ext 6233 or Brenda.Taylor@tritech.com
Here is a link <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/_UG/Sample_2-day_Group_Training_agenda.pdf> to download a sample copy of the agenda.
Registration will begin on the first day at 7:45 a.m. We sincerely hope that these two days of education will allow everyone to gain knowledge in the areas desired.
We invite you to dress casually and comfortably for the session. Since room temperatures and preferences vary from person to person, please bring a sweater or sweatshirt to wear if needed.
See you in March!
**TriTech retains the right to cancel training events 30 days prior to the event date if registrations are below the minimum required.**
